title: Pork with sweet potatoes & mojo pepper sauce

ingredients.item: 2 small sweet potatoes (about 425g), unpeeled, cut into thick chips
500g free range organic pork fillet, trimmed
230g jar Fragata Pimiento Piquillo Peppers, drained

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 220°C, gas mark 7 and line a large baking tray with parchment. Toss the sweet potato chips with 1 tbsp oil, flour, ½ tsp paprika and seasoning. Roast for 20 minutes, turning once, until golden.

Meanwhile, heat 1 tsp oil in a frying pan. Season the pork then sear over a high heat for 5 minutes. Transfer to the potato tray and roast for 15-20 minutes until cooked throughout with no pink meat and juices run clear.

Use a stick blender to blend the peppers with 1 tsp paprika, the cumin, garlic, vinegar and 1 tsp oil until smooth. Season to taste. When the pork is ready, transfer to a plate and let it rest for a couple of minutes. Slice thickly and serve with the sauce and chips.
